changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `log` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `source` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `level` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `message` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_polish_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
